page.title: 08Tregony Police Station
page.content: There are only three policemen at Tregony and two at Roseland;These cover the wide Roseland area.At Tregony they only have one car but can call for one from Truro. The main crime that the police have to deal with is criminal damage.There are reports of people poaching from farmland and private woods.The roads in this D_block are very narrow and windy and high hedges restrict visibility.Even so so there are not many serious road accidents,only minor incidents as people drive slowly. Being a rural district they do not have many serious crimes;On average two per week.The land population is small and they rarely have any hoax calls.One of the most common calls is for lost children.
